articles.title: An alternative to LASIK—without the lasers - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Millions of Americans have altered vision, ranging from blurriness to blindness. But not everyone wants to wear prescription glasses or contact lenses. Accordingly, hundreds of thousands of people undergo corrective eye surgery each year, including LASIK—a la…
